lead_paragraph: Fifth starter front-runner CC Sabathia allowed two runs and three hits over four innings as a New York Yankees split squad beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 5-4 Tuesday in a game shortened to five innings because of rain.

headline.print_headline: Sabathia Allows 2 Runs, Yankees Beat Pirates 5-4
headline.main: Sabathia Allows 2 Runs, Yankees Beat Pirates 5-4
